channel.title: github_trending

item.description: Pretty fancy and modern terminal file manager

item.description: 🔥 Open-source no-code web data extraction platform. Turn websites to APIs and spreadsheets with no-code robots in minutes [In Beta]

item.title: mlabonne /llm-course
item.description: Course to get into Large Language Models (LLMs) with roadmaps and Colab notebooks.

item.description: A self-hosted, ad-free, privacy-respecting metasearch engine

item.title: PatrickJS /awesome-cursorrules
item.description: 📄 A curated list of awesome .cursorrules files

item.title: jingyaogong /minimind
item.description: 🚀🚀 「大模型」3小时完全从0训练26M的小参数GPT！🌏 Train a 26M-parameter GPT from scratch in just 3 hours!

item.title: danielmiessler /fabric
item.description: fabric is an open-source framework for augmenting humans using AI. It provides a modular framework for solving specific problems using a crowdsourced set of AI prompts that can be used anywhere.

item.title: mudler /LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. Features: Generate Text, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P inference

item.title: CopilotKit /CopilotKit
item.description: React UI + elegant infrastructure for AI Copilots, in-app AI agents, AI chatbots, and AI-powered Textareas 🪁

item.title: Dokploy /dokploy
item.description: Open Source Alternative to Vercel, Netlify and Heroku.
